columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: describedObjects
columns.description: Reference to the Items or Pieces in which the product can be found.

columns.name: hsCode
columns.description: Harmonized Commodity code; refer to hsType used. 6 minimum digits are expected.

columns.name: manufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturing company details and contacts

columns.name: otherCharacteristics
columns.description: Charateristics of the product

columns.name: otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: commodityItemNumber
columns.description: Indicates the specific commodity on which the rate class code is applied

columns.name: description
columns.description: Natural language description if required

columns.name: hsCommodityDescription
columns.description: Commodity description

columns.name: hsCommodityName
columns.description: If no Code provided; name of commodity

columns.name: hsType
columns.description: Reference identifying the type of standard code to be used for the Commodity Classification (Brussels Tariff Nomenclature; EU Harmonized System Code; UN Standard International Trade Classification). Mandatory if the commodity code is more than 6 digits

columns.name: uniqueIdentifier
columns.description: Manufacturer's unique product identifier

columns.name: dgRadioactiveMaterial
columns.description: Dg Radioactive Material

columns.name: explosiveCompatibilityGroupCode
columns.description: Specifies the reference to the group which identifies the kind of substances and articles that are deemed to be compatible. Mandatory field in case of transport of explosive articles or substances

columns.name: packagingDangerLevelCode
columns.description: Packing group; If used must reference I; II or III

columns.name: additionalHazardClassificationId
columns.description: Identifies the subsidiary hazard class / division identification containing a numeric field separated by a decimal. There may be ; 1 or 2 subsidiary risk classes or divisions. If there is more than one; each should be separated by a comma. The subsidiary risk must be shown in parentheses.

columns.name: authorizationInformation
columns.description: Contains additional information relating to an approval; permission or other specific detail applicable to the commodity (e.g. Dangerous Goods in excepted quantities)

columns.name: hazardClassificationId
columns.description: Identifies the hazard class / division identification containing a numeric field separated by a decimal

columns.name: packingInstructionNumber
columns.description: The packing instruction number applicable to the UN number / proper shipping name entry. A three-numeric value which may be preceded by the letter Y.  Mandatory field for air transport (Air)

columns.name: properShippingName
columns.description: The name used to describe the particular article or substance as shown in the UN Model Regulations Dangerous Goods List

columns.name: specialProvisionId
columns.description: For Air Mode: Special Provision may show a single; double or triple digit number preceded by the letter A; against appropriate entries in the List of Dangerous Goods

columns.name: technicalName
columns.description: This is additional chemical name(s) required for some proper shipping names. When added the technical must be shown in parentheses immediately following the proper shipping name.

columns.name: unNumber
columns.description: Reference identifying the United Nations Dangerous Goods serial number assigned within the UN to substances and articles contained in a list of the dangerous goods most commonly carried. e.g. 1189 - Ethylene glycol monomethyl ether acetate
